children.value: New Items is a feature where you use a base item to create an item with added abilities.
To be clear, it's not the same as item synthesis.

• About
    • Characteristics
    • Pros and Cons
    • Creating New Items
    • Unlocking Secret Pots
    • Purchasing
    • New Items in Dungeons
  • Mechanics
    • Stats and Abilities
  • Popular Items
  • Abilities
    • Weapon
    • Shield
    • Bracelet
    • Grass
    • Scroll
    • Staff
    • Talisman
  • Cheating
Insert an item into a secret pot located in the basement of Hotel Nekomaneki,
and then wait until the next day for random abilities to get added.
If you like the added abilities, take the item out.
If you don't like the added abilities, leave the item in the pot.
The abilities are added at midnight, and change each day for 7 days.
Once it reaches day 8, the item turns into Weeds.
New Items can be created from weapons, shields, bracelets, grass, staves, scrolls, and talismans.
Other categories like pots, food, arrows, rocks, and torches can't be inserted into secret pots.
New Items are automatically registered when they're taken out of a secret pot,
and up to 64 items can be registered at a time.

Registered items can't be erased, with the exception of the oldest item being erased
when you exceed the 64 item registration limit.
They appear in some dungeons that don't allow carry-in items, so they can be a balance breaker.
Therefore, it's highly recommended to make 2 save files - 1 with New Items, and 1 without.

export const _frontmatter = {"title":"New Items","metaTitle":"New Items - Shiren the Wanderer: Tower of Fortune Wiki","metaDescription":"New Item brewing guide for Shiren the Wanderer: The Tower of Fortune and the Dice of Fate."}

{`Overview`}

{`New Items is a feature where you use a base item to create an item with added abilities.`}
{`To be clear, it's not the same as item synthesis.`}

{`About`}

{`Characteristics`}

{`Pros and Cons`}

{`Creating New Items`}

{`Insert an item into a secret pot located in the basement of Hotel Nekomaneki,`}
{` and then wait until the next day for random abilities to get added.`}

  • {`If you like the added abilities, take the item out.`}
  • {`If you don't like the added abilities, leave the item in the pot.`}

{`The abilities are added at midnight, and change each day for 7 days.`}
{` Once it reaches day 8, the item turns into Weeds.`}

{`New Items can be created from weapons, shields, bracelets, grass, staves, scrolls, and talismans.`}
{` Other categories like pots, food, arrows, rocks, and torches can't be inserted into secret pots.`}

{`New Items are automatically registered when they're taken out of a secret pot,`}
{`and up to 64 items can be registered at a time.`}

Registered items can't be erased, with the exception of the oldest item being erased
when you exceed the 64 item registration limit.

{`They appear in some dungeons that don't allow carry-in items, so they can be a balance breaker.`}
{` Therefore, it's highly recommended to make 2 save files - 1 with New Items, and 1 without.`}
